oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James Percy Priest, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pictured: James Percy Priest (April 1, 1900-October 12, 1956) was an American teacher, journalist and politician who represented Tennessee in the United States House of Representatives from 1941 until his death. Priest was born in Maury County, Tennessee. Prior to his political career, he joined the editorial staff of the Nashville Tennessean newspaper. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Priest, James Percy, 1900-1956
